statements: SELECT * FROM driving_data;
SELECT driver_id, driving_date, distance_km FROM driving_data WHERE incidents > 5;
SELECT MAX(avg_speed_kmh) AS max_speed FROM driving_data;
SELECT * FROM driving_data ORDER BY driving_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, SUM(distance_km) AS total_distance FROM driving_data GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, driving_date, distance_km, avg_speed_kmh, incidents FROM driving_data WHERE driver_id = 1 ORDER BY driving_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT driver_id, AVG(distance_km) as avg_distance, AVG(avg_speed_kmh) as avg_speed FROM driving_data GROUP BY driver_id HAVING avg_distance > 50 AND avg_speed < 100 ORDER BY avg_distance DESC, avg_speed ASC

SELECT driver_id, driving_date, distance_km, avg_speed_kmh, incidents FROM driving_data WHERE incidents > 3 AND driving_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incidents DESC, driving_date ASC
SELECT * FROM driving_data WHERE distance_km > 100 AND avg_speed_kmh > 80 ORDER BY distance_km DESC, avg_speed_kmh DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT driver_id, incidents, driving_date FROM driving_data WHERE incidents > 0 ORDER BY incidents DESC, driving_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data ORDER BY date_of_trip DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_name, end_location, duration_minutes FROM historical_driving_data WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT driver_name, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM historical_driving_data WHERE average_speed_km_per_hr > 60 AND date_of_trip BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, driver_name, date_of_trip, duration_minutes, average_speed_km_per_hr FROM historical_driving_data WHERE driver_name = 'Alice' OR driver_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM safety_improvements WHERE impact_on_safety LIKE '%significant%' ORDER BY implementation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY date_of_trip DESC;
SELECT driver_name, distance_km, duration_minutes FROM historical_driving_data WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT driver_name, start_location, end_location, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_trip, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM historical_driving_data WHERE average_speed_km_per_hr > 60;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration, MAX(distance_km) AS max_distance FROM historical_driving_data WHERE driver_name LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT hdd.driver_name, si.safety_measure, si.impact_on_safety FROM historical_driving_data hdd JOIN safety_improvements si ON hdd.id = si.related_driving_data_id WHERE si.implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY si.implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data;
SELECT driver_name, dob FROM driver_profile WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM safety_incidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, distance, speed FROM historical_driving_data WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT driver_id, description FROM safety_incidents WHERE incident_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data WHERE speed > 80 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, driver_id, date, description FROM safety_incidents WHERE driver_id = 12345;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license FROM driver_profile WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT driver_id, SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM historical_driving_data GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 60 AND 100 AND distance > 100 ORDER BY speed ASC, distance DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, birthdate FROM drivers ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT driver_id, name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT record_id, speed, location FROM driving_records WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, birthdate FROM drivers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year >= 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY penalty_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, license_number, age FROM drivers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2010;
SELECT brand, model, color FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM trips ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY driver_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT driver_name, age FROM drivers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_number FROM drivers LEFT JOIN violations ON drivers.driver_id = violations.driver_id WHERE violations.violation_type = 'Speeding'
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'Red' AND year > 2015 ORDER BY brand, model
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
